channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Deckers shares rally, as some fog clears on year ahead for maker of Hoka, Ugg shoes

item.title: Intel earnings tell two stories, as revenue impresses but losses pile up from restructuring
item.description: The chip maker’s stock was moving lower after mixed results and guidance.

item.title: FCC shows that its holdup of the Paramount-Skydance merger was political all along

item.title: He’s seen enough bull markets to be worried now. But this veteran investor still likes these tech stocks.
item.description: RIA Advisor’s Lance Roberts says Trump’s trade policies could trigger a correction soon.

item.title: Homeowners in these states are the winners if Trump ends capital-gains taxes for home sellers

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
